msg: added a little pom.xml for building the csharp plugins - we could maybe move the csharp plugins and a super pom to a child directory

author: sichen
msg: Comments on the marketing package production run service

author: awiner
msg: Add CoreRenderer and RenderUtils to the public API, leaving behind deprecated stubs this time...  Add a new pair of methods to RequestContext to save and restore the state of a component tree, basically just trivially exposing existing StateManagerImpl functionality in our public API

author: jtb
msg: 1. change to use org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64 instead of com.sun.syndication.io.impl.Base64. the latter was causing odd error when attempting to decode certain passwords. i don't really understand why though, but this is also what the APP endpoint uses.
2. check if user is disabled after auth
3. remove WSSE auth class. no use having that if it's not being kept up to date and not being unit tested. we can add it back in if we need it.
